variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier

variable.name: FULL_PAR
variable.description: Full or partial scan
variable.comment: Text field; blank = Unknown

variable.name: XRAYTUBE_1
variable.description: Tube current used to obtain the CT scan based upon body mass index (first scan)
variable.comment: Values were either 400 or 320 mA

variable.name: RECONSTR_1
variable.description: Reconstruction diameter (first scan)
variable.comment: For example, a reconstruction diameter of 350 (mm) is the diameter of the image. This number divided by 1024 will provide the X and Y dimensions of the image pixel.

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_950_1
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -950 (first scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_925_1
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -925 (first scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_910_1
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -910 (first scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_856_1
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -856 (first scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_HAA_1
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value between -600 Hounsfield Units and -250 (first scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_PERC_10_1
variable.description: Hounsfield Unit threshold that demarcates the lowest 10th percentile of the lung density histogram (first scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_PERC_15_1
variable.description: Hounsfield Unit threshold that demarcates the lowest 15th percentile of the lung density histogram (first scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_MEAN_1
variable.description: Mean of the density histogram obtained from the lung fields in the CT scan i.e. mean lung density (first scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_STD_1
variable.description: Standard deviation of the mean lung density (first scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_SKEWNESS_1
variable.description: Skewness of the lung density histogram (first scan)
variable.comment: No Units

variable.name: GLOBAL_KURTOSIS_1
variable.description: Kurtosis of the lung density histogram (first scan)
variable.comment: No units

variable.name: GLOBAL_MODE_1
variable.description: Mode of the lung density histogram (first scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_VOL_ml_1
variable.description: Volume of the lungs (first scan)

variable.name: XRAYTUBE_2
variable.description: Tube current used to obtain CT scan based upon body mass index (second scan).
variable.comment: Values were either 400 or 320 mA

variable.name: RECONSTR_2
variable.description: Reconstruction diameter (second scan)
variable.comment: For example, a reconstruction diameter of 350 (mm) is the diameter of the image. This number divided by 1024 will provide the X and Y dimensions of the image pixel.

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_950_2
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -950 (second scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_925_2
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -925 (second scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_910_2
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -910 (second scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_LAA_856_2
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value less than -856 (second scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_HAA_2
variable.description: Fraction of lung that has an attenuation value between -600 Hounsfield Units and -250 (second scan)
variable.comment: No units, i.e. this is a fraction from 0 to 1.0

variable.name: GLOBAL_PERC_10_2
variable.description: Hounsfield Unit threshold that demarcates the lowest 10th percentile of the lung density histogram (second scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_PERC_15_2
variable.description: Hounsfield Unit threshold that demarcates the lowest 15th percentile of the lung density histogram (second scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_MEAN_2
variable.description: Mean of the density histogram obtained from the lung fields in the CT scan i.e. mean lung density (second scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_STD_2
variable.description: Standard deviation of the mean lung density (second scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_SKEWNESS_2
variable.description: Skewness of the lung density histogram (second scan)
variable.comment: No units

variable.name: GLOBAL_KURTOSIS_2
variable.description: Kurtosis of the lung density histogram (second scan)
variable.comment: No units

variable.name: GLOBAL_MODE_2
variable.description: Mode of the lung density histogram (second scan)

variable.name: GLOBAL_VOL_ml_2
variable.description: Volume of the lungs in ml (second scan)

variable.name: scandate
variable.description: CT Scan date
variable.comment: number of days since exam 1
